        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="23081" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="23081" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.01</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="429">429</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="55"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Tralala</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. <b>Tralala</b> was launched in 2014. The nose behind this fragrance is Bertrand Duchaufour. Top notes are Whiskey, Violet, Saffron and Aldehydes; middle notes are Leather, Incense, Carnation and Tuberose; base notes are Vanilla, Musk, Patchouli and Vetiver. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Tralala was created by Penhaligon's for the Meadham Kirchhoff fashion house as their first perfume. </p>

<p></p>

<p>The fragrance was made by the perfumer Bertrand Duchaufour. Top notes are aldehydes, saffron, whiskey and violet; middle notes are leather, tuberose, incense and carnation; base notes are patchouli, vetiver, musk and vanilla.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger"                             <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>
                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">0</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    May not be suitable for those who prefer subtle scents
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">

</fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="23081"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.210.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Whiskey-210.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Whiskey</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; </pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.156.jpg" style="width: 4.7rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Leather-156.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Leather</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.68.jpg" style="width: 4.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Incense-68.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Incense</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.90318300578584; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.7.jpg" style="width: 3.325rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Carnation-7.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Carnation</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.81007176538254; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.25.jpg" style="width: 2.825rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Tuberose-25.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Tuberose</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.74.jpg" style="width: 4.525rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Vanilla-74.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Vanilla</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.81007176538254; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.4.jpg" style="width: 2.825rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Musk-4.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Musk</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.80477139066561; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.34.jpg" style="width: 2.8rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Patchouli-34.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Patchouli</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.2.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Vetiver-2.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Vetiver</div></div></div>

    <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/news/en/11998/news.11998-120x120.jpg" alt="Alcohol in Fragrance: For Those Who Like It Sweeter" style="margin-right: 1em; flex-shrink: 0">    <div class="flex-child-auto">
        <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/news/Alcohol-in-Fragrance-For-Those-Who-Like-It-Sweeter-11998.html">
            <span class="clickcatcher"></span><h4>Alcohol in Fragrance: For Those Who Like It Sweeter</h4>
        </a>
        <p>by <i>Elena Prokofeva</i></p>
        <div class="right-bottom-corner-abs">            03/13/19 19:09
                    </div>
    </div>

    <span class="badge">14</span>
</div>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><longevity-rating :perfume_id="23081"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume longevity:<span>3.53</span> out of<span>5</span>.</p></longevity-rating></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><sillage-rating :perfume_id="23081"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume sillage:<span>2.78</span> out of<span>4</span>.</p></sillage-rating></div><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_4 -->

    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2326682" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2326682" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="entropygirl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1159175"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1159175.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="entropygirl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2326682ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2326682" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1159175">entropygirl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-24">10/24/24 18:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I could not get enough of my sample of this beautiful scent- the combination of tobacco and leather make it feel so risque and fun. In fact, if you are looking to get rid of your own tralala sample or bottle... please PM me !!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23081"comment_id="2326682"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Tralala-23081.html?ccid=2326682#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1943049" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1943049" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sdevyatova"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/424281"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.424281.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sdevyatova" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Memo-Paris/Lyra-Peach-91089.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91089.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lyra Peach "title="Lyra Peach "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1943049ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1943049" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/424281">sdevyatova</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-03">10/03/23 05:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I imagine a French courtesan somewhere in the 18th century having a quick glass of whiskey and smoking a cigarette, leaving it burn off in an ashtray and subsequently getting dressed in her provocative frilly lingerie to meet the next client…an intoxicating scent… full of sin, evoking forbidden games</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23081"comment_id="1943049"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Tralala-23081.html?ccid=1943049#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1771413" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1771413" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jackandpenny"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1526575"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1526575.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jackandpenny" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1771413ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1771413" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1526575">Jackandpenny</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-28">02/28/23 09:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wasn’t sure what I thought if this my first time.<br />
Initially I wasn’t too into it but after the dry down both on paper and my skin I thought I’d give it another go.<br />
This reminds me both of Shalimar and Toujours Moi, it’s a very retro scent that brings to mind flappers and illicit alcohol parties but this one’s younger and not as partied out.  Not much floral here. Theres smokiness and incense, a boozy aspect, very little of sparkle or lightness, if it has an aura it’s smoky rose gold.<br />
I do like it for what it is, some may find Habanita or Shalimar more nuanced but it’s a fun little number if you wanna feel like a cheeky 1920s chick (wear Habanita or Shalimar if you wanna feel outright badass).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23081"comment_id="1771413"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Tralala-23081.html?ccid=1771413#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1717248" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Trust me, not only the bottle design is 10/10, but also the scent.<br />
<br />
The scent smells vintage with suede leather.<br />
<br />
It is so funny I fell in love with this in hot humidity HK back in 2014</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23081"comment_id="1618477"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Tralala-23081.html?ccid=1618477#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent1519052" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1519052" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bel 1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1427354"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1427354.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bel 1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Stephane-Humbert-Lucas-777/Sand-Dance-72384.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72384.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sand Dance"title="Sand Dance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1519052ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1519052" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1427354">bel 1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-08">03/08/22 10:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I took quite a gamble on this as I don’t typically like vanilla scents but love leather/incense/saffron/whiskey/violet and basically every other note listed. I get mostly a very powdery vanilla with a lot of whiskey and not much else, as unfortunately my nose never lets me smell anything other than vanilla when that note is present.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23081"comment_id="1519052"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Tralala-23081.html?ccid=1519052#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1433599" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1433599" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Spring rose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/39536"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.39536.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Spring rose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1433599ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1433599" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/39536">Spring rose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-24">10/24/21 01:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lovely artistic perfume. It opened with a sharp combination of alcoholic notes (maybe whiskey) and aldehydes on my skin. Soon vanilla took over, but it had a leather, animalic touch on me, mixed with an almost artificial bubblegum carnation note, making it dirty and lovely. Very unique to my nose. Wonderful fragrance that developed on my skin divinely. Lingering sweet notes stayed on my skin for hours. So sad it has been discontinued. This was such a unique scent that I cherished for years, and it is terrible how expensive it is nowadays, even if one finds it. Sadly, I only have an empty bottle to remember it by.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23081"comment_id="1433599"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Tralala-23081.html?ccid=1433599#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1430924" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1430924" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Enfant du monde"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1260791"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1260791.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Enfant du monde" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/Divin-Enfant-4514.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4514.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Divin'Enfant"title="Divin'Enfant"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1430924ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1430924" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1260791">Enfant du monde</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-19">10/19/21 12:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I finally got to try this, and I am delighted. It's hard to find in Japan. <br />
Tralala is an old-fashion buzzy, kinky vanilla fragrance—my favorite kind of vanilla, to be precise. <br />
I do get the vanilla smell of the plastic doll heads that someone mentioned, combined with aldehydes and something salty (Safran, maybe). I also smell sweet carnation essence from time to time. <br />
It is cheap smelling in the best way possible—very old Hollywood-like. I want it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23081"comment_id="1430924"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Tralala-23081.html?ccid=1430924#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1408167" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1408167" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zaca"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1231844"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1231844.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zaca" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/A-Men-705.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.705.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="A*Men"title="A*Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1408167ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1408167" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1231844">Zaca</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-10">09/10/21 22:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like the morning after a drunken night out of which you can't remember the details, but you may or may not have had a one-night stand (which may or may not have been with more than one person...) Boozy, saffron and carnation-laced vanilla. And leather. Sadly, now almost impossible to find.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23081"comment_id="1408167"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Tralala-23081.html?ccid=1408167#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1296709" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1296709" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KBF1982"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/688106"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.688106.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KBF1982" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Can-t-Stop-Loving-You-78735.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78735.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Can't Stop Loving You"title="Can't Stop Loving You"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1296709ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1296709" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); I have been desperately seeking this for a while.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23081"comment_id="1296709"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Tralala-23081.html?ccid=1296709#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1288208" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1288208" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="miriamcarothers"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1094277"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1094277.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="miriamcarothers" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Babycat-73149.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73149.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Babycat"title="Babycat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1288208ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1288208" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); Was just chatting with a pal about Tralala being the only Penhalington fragrance Im actually into- Looked to see if I could find a backup bottle and not even eBay-ers are listing this! Relieved I’ve still got 70% of my current bottle safe in its dreamy packaging! <br />
😅</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23081"comment_id="1288208"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Tralala-23081.html?ccid=1288208#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1286240" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1286240" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HeavyBeatsUK"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/488635"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.488635.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="HeavyBeatsUK" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1286240ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1286240" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); Weird fennel smell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23081"comment_id="1286240"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Tralala-23081.html?ccid=1286240#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1247639" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1247639" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cherry_Darling"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1003821"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1003821.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cherry_Darling" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Pascal-Morabito/Perle-Pour-Elle-47506.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47506.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Perle Pour Elle"title="Perle Pour Elle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1247639ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1247639" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1003821">Cherry_Darling</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-11-12">11/12/20 07:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got this as a blind extra in a generous swap - so I tried it straight away. My guess was opium, cinnabar or nu, spicy, clovey, old fashioned. Surprised it's a penhaligon's and not something from the 80s or 90s! I think it's the mix of carnation, aldehydes and tuberose that has my nose set. I'm not getting whiskey, nor leather, but a powdery, spicy, sparkling, smoky floral. Not really sweet, a little powdery. To me this is more "old fashioned" than I generally like to wear but interesting to test. Let's see if leather appears on the drydown.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23081"comment_id="1247639"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Tralala-23081.html?ccid=1247639#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1184594" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1184594" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SMELLBOY"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1224947"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SMELLBOY" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lush/Uptown-Funk-Body-Spray-39762.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39762.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Uptown Funk Body Spray"title="Uptown Funk Body Spray"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1184594ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1184594" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1224947">SMELLBOY</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-06-05">06/05/20 14:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>DITZY - BOOZY - SMOKY and full of gorgeous fragranced regret.<br />
<br />
This makes me feel like I’m 10 whiskey cocktails into a Friday night at the Glory and grabbing sequin stage curtains to keep myself upright.<br />
<br />
An absolute gem.  <br />
<br />
Its a real shame that its discontinued and impossible to find, I would LOVE another bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23081"comment_id="1184594"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Tralala-23081.html?ccid=1184594#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1176456" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1176456" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marialina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234337"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1234337.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marialina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1176456ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1176456" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234337">Marialina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-05-16">05/16/20 06:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I remembered this perfume today, out of the blue, and found my old bottle. I think I'm missing people and parties during lockdown, and couldn't think of a scent more redolent of, well, drunken Soho night life.<br />
<br />
I hadn't noticed this before, but I was really surprised to discover it's a Bertrand Duchaufour! I thought of it when I first bought it as a kind of clumsy, slapdash fragrance. In fact on first spray, many years ago, it elicited a huge laugh- not unpleasant, on the contrary- it smells entirely like whisky. Blended whisky. Not the expensive kind. Mixed with feminine perfume, vanilla, violet. Like your very glamorous, actress mum, having been out on the lash after a stage performance and possibly been arrested. It makes you smell like a drunk.<br />
<br />
But I love it. This is definitely not for everyone- extremely polarising. Absolutely seek it out if you're willing to smell like pure scandal.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23081"comment_id="1176456"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Tralala-23081.html?ccid=1176456#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1105898" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1105898" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Teddyboy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1205928"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1205928.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Teddyboy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Tralala-23081.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23081.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tralala"title="Tralala"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1105898ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1105898" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1205928">Teddyboy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-10-11">10/11/19 18:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Meadham Kirchhoff, the eccentric duo who were once the darlings of London Fashion Week with their kooky good-girl-gone-bad and bad-boy-gone-good presentations that echoed the sheer vim and verve of early John Galliano tableaux, commissioned this as their signature house scent; prior to this they had been saturating their theatrical sets with other Pengaligon’s Fragrances, literally misting their venues from gardener’s spray bottles filled with Hammam Bouquet (their favourite Penhaligon’s fragrance). Their influence has outlasted their brand, much to the chagrin of many a British fashion follower - you see it in heaps on the Gucci catwalk now, and their putting boys in streetwear overlaid with embroidered tulle dresses or broderie Anglaise predated all the current furor for less aggressive male dressing that still maintains a degree of wearability Only maybe a handful of intrepid Japanese menswear designers ever moored their ships on that ethereal coastline of the Lolita-boys before they did.<br />
<br />
So you see, in light of my sheer admiration of them as designers, my review may already be the biased one of a rabid fanboy.<br />
<br />
But Tralala truly is a wonderful perfume by a great creator. Like Meadham Kirchhoff’s refined Gothic Lolita confections, this scent evokes a perversity beneath its prim powdered demeanour. The booze does hit you right off the bat, but a bright quality whiskey garlanded by Fantin-Latour blooms - unfussy, masterstrokes of translucency. For a moment the gourmand associations hit you along with the whiskey: Parma violets, pastel-hued bonbons and butterscotch. But the leather and musks with the delicious girlishness of deftly-used saffron rein it back in from Marie Antoinette territory and bring forth scenes of a Prohibition-era speakeasy, cheap booze laced with a dry sweetness and the effulgence of Shalimar and cigarette smoke in the air. It’s been said before by other reviewers, but there definitely is a tribute to early Guerlain in this, and yet it is a thoroughly modern reworking of the 20s. Spray this on if you have the good fortune to find it (it’s been discontinued) and play ‘My Name Is Tallulah’ from Bugsy Malone, recline as decadently as you can, and let Tralala take you places before it peters out into a shy musky violet wisp, the kind you wouldn’t mind smelling on fresh sheets.<br />
<br />
As for that packaging, it’s a small wonder Penhaligon’s let them go to town on that almost ridiculous velvet bow and music box presentation; it stuck out joyously from all the other prim little bow ties in their boutique. This is the perfume that drew me away from my usual love of ‘manly’ orientals and woods and I am sad that it went the way of the Meadham Kirchhoff label. But perhaps, some things are too good to drag on forever.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23081"comment_id="1105898"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Tralala-23081.html?ccid=1105898#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1101296" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1101296" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mschnabel666"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/573132"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.573132.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mschnabel666" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Smoking-Hot-84413.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84413.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Smoking Hot"title="Smoking Hot"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1101296ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1101296" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/573132">mschnabel666</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-09-26">09/26/19 06:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am HELLA excited. I blind bought this NIB from a US private seller. This has been on my radar for awhile, I love leather/boozy/vanilla/spicy/vintage/strange smelling scents.<br />
And I love the idea that it could be named after Tralala from Last Exit to Brooklyn. That is a GRIM book and Tralala is a very tragic character, but I love Selby and "dark/depressing" books.<br />
I can't wait to get this!!!!!!!<br />
<br />
It's here! A quick sniff from the bottle has def Shalimar vibes- I'm so excited! Shalimar is def my Top 3!<br />
<br />
Will update with my wear!! I haven't been this excited in.... months!!! ;)<br />
<br />
My thoughts:<br />
<br />
I LOVE THIS. THIS is perfect! Art! I understand and agree that POWDERY is about 70% of the scent. Creamy, sweet, waxy makeup/baby powder. The booze in the first 1-3 hours is JUICY- so much I could swear there is fruit in this. The vanilla is always a strong note- making this creamy plastic candy sweet. The vanilla/sweet/leather reminds me very much of L'Artisan Traversee du Bosphore (same nose/perfumer). If you like TdB- you must try Tralala if you come across it. Same goes for Tralala fans- try TdB!<br />
<br />
This also reminds me of my faves- a bit Shalimar (but not really) and a lot like Habanita. If you remove the smokey-incense-darkness from Habanita- you get Tralala. If Habanita is Bettie Page, then Tralala is a bubbly red headed pinup with a knife in her pocketbook. Tralala is Clara Bow! Goes along with the cute bottle- playful!<br />
<br />
Tralala has interesting artistic "pops"- I did get something animalic-funky like Dzing briefly. More like body odor than meat.<br />
<br />
I'm a bit shocked the first "categories" on this page are Warm Spicy and Leather. For me, it's def Powdery first, then whiskey. The drydown after about 5 hours is nice smooth incense/vanilla- polite churchy light incense.<br />
<br />
I don't detect any aldehydes, saffron (saffron is prob to blame for the body/funk in the opening tho), or tuberose. The booze is very juicy/wet- but it's not overly alcoholic. You won't smell drunk. ;) <br />
<br />
Lasted fantastically on clothing all night. Dries down back to creamy vanilla powder/incense, again- similar to Habanita but in no way a clone.<br />
<br />
I'm so happy I found this affordably (well... haha.....) and from the US. I will treasure this! OMG! I love it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23081"comment_id="1101296"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Tralala-23081.html?ccid=1101296#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1090111" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1090111" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Michelle12345678"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1014935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1014935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Michelle12345678" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Commodity/Gold-70015.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70015.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gold +"title="Gold +"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1090111ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1090111" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); There is almost some cinnamon in here. All of that is great. However, it turns powdery, and that I don't like. Interesting to try but I wouldn't buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23081"comment_id="1090111"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Tralala-23081.html?ccid=1090111#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1045406" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1152260">xmelldefrag</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-03-27">03/27/19 20:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I did a blindbuy on this. Seeing that it has whiskey and notes, i thought that this perfume would smelled like bdsm hahahahaha...<br />
But no, this is a joyous perfume, think about kids, because the whiskey note, combined with tuberose really create a baby powder sensation, and i dont get the leather from my first usage...<br />
<br />
It's joyous, just like the cap, feels like a kid trying out his/her mothers make up... And they got scary, and we saw it and laughed at their silliness...<br />
<br />
It smells really like Tralalalalalalala</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23081"comment_id="1045406"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Tralala-23081.html?ccid=1045406#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1004024" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1004024" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Madrona"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/990027"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.990027.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Madrona" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hugo-Boss/Boss-Intense-388.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.388.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Boss Intense"title="Boss Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1004024ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1004024" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);
